Equalize.title: equalize
Equalize.tooltip: Apply equalize on the input tensor.

image.title: image
image.tooltip: image tensor to equalize with shape (*,C,H,W)

Equalize_Clahe.title: equalize clahe
Equalize_Clahe.tooltip: Apply clahe equalization on the input tensor.

image.title: image
image.tooltip: images tensor to equalize with values in the range [0, 1] and shape (*,C,H,W)

clip_limit.title: clip_limit
clip_limit.tooltip: threshold value for contrast limiting. If 0 clipping is disabled.

grid_size.title: grid_size
grid_size.tooltip: number of tiles to be cropped in each direction (GH, GW).

image.title: image
image.tooltip: Equalized image or images with shape (*,C,H,W) as the input.
